features: Origin Made in USA or Imported
Our Cashmery Soft Casual Sweater is of Quality Fabric Construction 100% Kashmerey Acrylic & Ultra Comfy Soft / Light Weight for Year Round / Warm
This lightweight and soft pullover combines comfortable, modern and classy, which make it a perfect fit for any occasion. -Great for Casual, Vacation, Party, Work, School, Club, Beach Vacation ,
Goes well with jeans leggings and other basic piece. You can easily transition from casual to business, or evening.
Size Guide: S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=16.
body.description: PROJECT BETTER PLACE APPAREL - Collection - Kashmery Feel Sweaters Material: 100% Kashmery Acrylic This knit pullover sweater is made of high quality fabric, that is breathable, comfy and ultra soft, - so perfect for everyday wear, Cashmere Soft Feel knit fabric provides a loose fit. Giving you purely comfy and airy touch. Features: Long sleeve Crew neck pullover. Never go out of fashion. The material is so Cashmery Super Soft - it's made for nights of movie watching on the couch! You can easily wear this as a one shoulder, off the shoulder, or classic Round neck pullover! It's so easy to throw this on over your favorite lace camis or bralettes for a comfortable and stylish look! Fashion : This women's casual sweater can be paired with jeans, leggings, casual pant, handbag , backpack or boots. It looks great! Occasion: Great for Casual, Vacation, Party, Work, School, Club, Beach Vacation. Update your wardrobe this season with our sweaters. Care ：Machine washable and Dry. Hang or line dry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal Nice quality
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic quality, super soft material, very happy with purchase! Size was perfect! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These sweaters are comfy and warm. The wash well and are not itchy! Great for around the house or out and about. Capable of layering. Run true to size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got two sweaters in a pack. I ordered a size larger than I usually wear, and they fit nicely,One of sweater’s has extra long arms, but it’s not a problem.I don’t know how well these sweaters will hold up, but I intend to hand wash, and lay flat to dry, hopefully extending their wear. I am happy with the sweaters considering the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its gorgeous and feels better than anything i own but its definitely not true to size which was disappointing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Runs small and the fit is bizarre
reviews.reviewText: I ordered twice. Once in a large and the second time in XL and they’re both packed up and ready to be returned. I knew the price was too good to be true… you get what you pay for. The sweater material itself is soft. The style with the slight V-neck was great. The colors I selected ( black and royal blue ) were also nice. Now here was my problem… first the sleeve and the shoulder seams were uneven which made the fit bizarre and made it feel tight. I felt like a linebacker in this sweater and I don’t even have broad shoulders!! I wish I didn’t pack it up already so I could show you what I mean about the seams. The length on both Large and XL was the same.. and it was too short. Not short enough to qualify as cropped, but not long enough to even partially tuck. The bottom of the sweater looked blown out, and the sleeves were oddly long. The fit and cut of this sweater was literally bizarre and that’s putting it mildly. Normally, I’m a medium or a large in sweaters, and sometimes I’ll go to an XL if I want it really oversized. Depending on the material and style of the sweater and how I plan to wear it. This sweater didn’t fit much different in large and XL and I would compare it with a tight medium with jacked up seams. I hope you have a better experience with it then I did. Good luck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and pretty color
reviews.reviewText: I chose green and I love it! And this sweater is so soft! It’s easy to dress up or dress down, casual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Completely wrong colors were sent to me
reviews.reviewText: Although the sweaters are soft and cute, I was sent three completely different colors from what I ordered

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feel like cashmere
reviews.reviewText: These are very warm for winter days and material is very soft like my real cashmere but less expensive

I like the soft feel of the knit , it looks like a cashmere blend ,it really surprised me how nice these are. I am glad I took a chance on these affordable sweaters. I ended up buying 3. The colours are better than depicted.I fit a medium but ended up ordering the large for an oversized , comfortable feel. I am 5''4 and 145 lbs , if that helps anyone , and a little larger in the chest (40'' ) and both sizes were good-depending on whether you want loose or more fitted look.These sweaters are my winter staple,I just rotate colours through the week. I a very happy customer and hope that this company keeps including warm colours in their selection.I like that this company is trying to make a difference for their workers too!
